Bug_report.Summary: The menu title [Prof] cannot be clicked
Bug_report.Steps: Navigate to car.com, Select one of the licenses FCA, CYSEC, Select EN language, lick on the menu section [Ways], Click on the menu title [Professional Tr]
Bug_report.Actual: The menu title [Professional Tr] cannot be clicked
Bug_report.Expected: The menu title [Professional Tr] click is available
